mapper.select: select id, elder, item_name, amount, remark, expense_date, created_at, updated_at from expenses order by updated_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into expenses(elder, item_name, amount, remark, expense_date, created_at, updated_at) values (#{elder}, #{itemName}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{expenseDate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
